divs: Sighting DetailsI left work at 4pm just a half mile away. i stopped at a news paper store then after talking with friends inside stre for 20 min. or so i left it was dusk as i was going to my car i could'nt help realizing a large presents above me. I was amazed. I just stared at it trying to figure out what i was seeing. i first thought it was our millitary testing something because that would be logical .but 20 seconds or so i realized it was not. i was seeing something truly amazing. it was only 100 ft.or so away,directly over my head. it was silent but spining in a clocrwise direction i cold clearly see a light grayish mass,i would call metal like with bright dark yellow -red lights ,2 or 3 rows of them on the diamater. it moved slowly at first moving across the parking lot .when it moved down the street , i got into my car and followed it to the next town 1 mile away i saw people looking up . so i figured everybody new about it.not realing concerned tho,i just wanted to see it more so i followed it to route 35 heading west . in the course of seconds it sped away at a rate i would describe as unbelievable.one moment it was 200 ft, in dia. the next it was just a star size light. it dissapeared.
